meanings.definition: Full of quips or witty remarks.
meanings.sent1: She is the quippiest person in our group, always making us laugh with her clever comments.
meanings.sent2: The comedian delivered the quippiest lines during the show, leaving the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone wanted to sit next to Sarah because she was the quippiest and kept the conversation lively.
meanings.sent4: His quippiest responses were like sharp arrows, hitting the target with precision and humor.
meanings.sent5: The quippiest student in class had a way of turning even the most boring topics into entertaining discussions.

meanings.definition: Showing a tendency to make quips or witty remarks.
meanings.sent1: The teacher's quippiest student always had a quick comeback for any question asked in class.
meanings.sent2: During the meeting, the boss displayed his quippiest side, lightening the mood with his humorous comments.
meanings.sent3: Even in serious situations, she couldn't help but show her quippiest nature, bringing a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent4: His quippiest behavior at work made him the favorite colleague to have around during long hours.
meanings.sent5: The quippiest friend in the group could turn any dull moment into a fun and lively one with just a few words.
